title: Neelam Thoongum Vaanil Lyrics Inayathalam
stanzas:
Neelam thoongum vaanil
nilavin asaivugal.
neelam pooththa kannil
kanavin kasivugal.

oru paravai iru siragu
oru valiyil iru manadhu
thinam kanavil
varum pozhudhu.

Neelam thoongum vaanil
nilavin asaivugal.
neelam pooththa kannil
kanavin kasivugal

Irulin thiraigal vilaga
vilaga pazhaiya bimbame.
iravu muzhudhum
manadhil alaiyum
miraga mirugame

thorpatharke oru yutham
naarpthile thodangiyathe
pozhudhu mattum vidigirathe
manadhin vali thodargirathe

Neelam thoongum vaanil
nilavin asaivugal.
neelam pooththa kannil
kanavin kasivugal.(2)

seo.title: Neelam Thoongum Vaanil Lyrics Inayathalam
seo.description: Get the complete Neelam Thoongum Vaanil Lyrics Inayathalam from Inayathalam. Read the lyrics penned by Marabin Maindhan Muthiah and composed by Arrol Corelli and sung by Madhu Balakrishnan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Marabin Maindhan Muthiah, Inayathalam, Arrol Corelli, Madhu Balakrishnan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
